import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Cart() { return (

Your Cart

Review your selected items before checkout

Cart Items

Cart items will be displayed here

Organic Apples

$4.99/lb × 2 lbs = $9.98

Fresh Carrots

$2.99/bunch × 1 bunch = $2.99

Order Summary

Subtotal: $12.97
Tax: $1.04
Total: $14.01
Proceed to Checkout
); } export default Cart;
